allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(indexer\): extract resolveJSSymbol helper to reduce nesting in call site extraction

Extract shared identifier/member_expression resolution logic into a
resolveJSSymbol helper, eliminating duplication between extractJSCallSite
and the new_expression handling. Also adds new_expression support as a
proper extracted function matching the existing pattern.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
test\(indexer\): add line number assertions for new_expression call sites

Address review comment requesting test coverage for constructor call
line tracking. The tests for direct and namespaced new_expression
already existed but lacked line number verification.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/alfhenderson/Code/lien commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(mcp\): simplify list-functions note to inline ternary
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/alfhenderson/Code/lien commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(mcp\): address Copilot review feedback on semantic-search

- Use ''warning'' log level for cross-repo fallback message
- Show actionable diagnostic note for all empty results, including
  when results were filtered as not_relevant
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/alfhenderson/Code/lien commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(mcp\): add note field to SimilarCodeResponse type
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/alfhenderson/Code/lien commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs\(ast\): update PythonExportExtractor docstring with re-export support
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/alfhenderson/Code/lien commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(ast\): reduce complexity of extractReExportNames

Extract findModulePathIndex into its own method and simplify the
aliased_import block with named constants per Veille review feedback.
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/alfhenderson/Code/lien commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(ast\): extract aliased import handling into own method

Move aliased_import logic out of extractReExportNames into
extractAliasedImportName to reduce cognitive complexity below threshold.
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/alfhenderson/Code/lien commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(ast\): address Copilot review feedback on Python re-exports

- Guard against startIndex === -1 in extractReExportNames with early return
- Extract shared extractAliasedSymbolName helper used by both
  PythonExportExtractor and PythonImportExtractor
- Add tests for absolute imports, current-package imports, and wildcards
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/alfhenderson/Code/lien commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(core\): unify ALWAYS_IGNORE_PATTERNS into single source of truth

scanner.ts and gitignore.ts had separate ALWAYS_IGNORE_PATTERNS constants
\(6 vs 15 patterns\) that kept diverging, causing repeated review comments.

- Export ALWAYS_IGNORE_PATTERNS from gitignore.ts \(the comprehensive list\)
- Import in scanner.ts, delete its local copy
- Remove hardcoded dist/build/min/.lien patterns from scanCodebase\(\) and
  scanFramework\(\) â€” now covered by the shared constant
- Remove redundant excludePatterns from scanFilesToIndex\(\) fallback

Related issues: #141, #142, #143, #144
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/alfhenderson/Code/lien commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(core\): extract loadGitignore helper to reduce scanFramework complexity

Veille flagged scanFramework at 1h 6m time-to-understand. Extract the
nested try/catch gitignore loading into a reusable loadGitignore\(\) helper
used by both scanFramework and scanCodebase.
EOF
\)")
